topic.title: easy way to export/copy muted users to a list ?
topic.body: hello, i want to ask if there is a easy and quick way to take users from http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/#[object%20Object],Manage%20blocked%20users%20and%20sites and move them to a block list ?

topic.title: 0podcasts  is there anything?
topic.body: is there any service to upload and mirror podcasts?

topic.title: movie hash collaborative site possible ?
topic.body:
is possible to have something like this in zeronet?

use case

1 user pick a file from their PC

2 the hash of the movie is calculated

3 the movie resolution is saved

4 the user is asked to rate A & V  from 0 to 10

5 also the user is asked to pick a profile WEBDL-480p/Bluray-480p/Bluray-576/pHDTV-720p/WEBDL-720p/Bluray-720p/HDTV-1080p/WEBDL-1080p

6 the user then can add a comment if they like 



so the zsite will only have; hash of the movie, resolution, user A/V, user movie profile and comments

1540893676_1PqrpogAwPjPf9T7bJjWWAjzTaRQc.body: take a look at anti-library project http://127.0.0.1:43110/antilibrary.bit
